name: Lux Anima
description:
Play as amorphous creature that can shapeshift to adapt to its surroundings. Use the 3 different animal forms to collect rings and avoid an untimely death.

All of the art, sound, and code for this game was made in 48 hours as part of Ludum Dare 35.

Small bug-fixes and accessibility tweaks were patched in several days after the competition ended.
